<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/tokens/v1/all"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



:::note
Returns all tokens with all metadata.
Refer to [Token API doc](/docs/token-api) for more information.
:::
